Question: Analogix Semiconductor, Inc CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Analogix Semiconductor, Inc

Product: Second Generation ANX74xx Family of 10 Gbps USB 3.2 Single-Chip Re-Timer

- Capable of switching DisplayPort and USB 3.2 Gen2 signals
- Low power consumption and integrated clock source
- Improved robustness of DisplayPort 1.4a and USB 3.2
- Ideal for high-performance, low-power notebooks, 2-in-1 convertible laptops, desktop PCs, mobile devices, and servers
- Complies with USB Repeater Specification for USB Gen 1 (5G) and Gen 2 (10G)
- Product demonstrations at CES 2019, Analogix Meeting Place MP25763 in LVCC South Hall 2

For more information visit www.analogix.com
Summary_cn:
Analogix Semiconductor, Inc

产品：第二代ANX74xx系列的10 Gbps USB 3.2单片射频器

- 能够切换DisplayPort和USB 3.2 Gen2信号
- 低功耗和集成时钟源
- 提高了DisplayPort 1.4a和USB 3.2的稳定性
- 非常适用于高性能、低功耗的笔记本电脑、2合1可转换笔记本、台式电脑、移动设备和服务器
- 符合USB Gen 1（5G）和Gen 2（10G）的USB中继规范
- 在CES 2019上产品演示，地点为Analogix会议场所MP25763，位于LVCC South Hall 2

欲了解更多信息，请访问www.analogix.com
